title: Streaming Expression and Math Expression tests fail too frequently
description: There are a number of Streaming Expression and Math Expression tests which have already been badappled. There are others that are failing much too frequently that still run as part of the jenkins test runs. This ticket will fix these issues and remove the badapples.

comments.content: The first thing I plan to do this is suppress SSL for StreamExpressionTest and StreamDecoratorTest as SSL is breaking these test cases. At another time I'll create a ticket to see if this can be fixed.
comments.author: Joel Bernstein
